__e: A few weeks ago, she said she had to meet some man.
I told her not to worry about money, that I could pay for everything.
He said he's going to do himself in to protect me and my daughter.
But if he does live, it'll be because he believes he'll never see you again.
Like, she's so pretty and guys love her and she doesn't even really want a job, so, like, she really has nothing to worry about.
Told you to leave work early, that he'd talk to you when he saw you.
